subject: Fenway Park (Boston)
Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Detroit’s Torii Hunter, who crashed into Boston’s bullpen Sunday after tumbling over the outfield wall trying to catch a homer, said on Monday he was prepared to play again.
snippet: Detroit’s Torii Hunter, who crashed into Boston’s bullpen Sunday after tumbling over the outfield wall trying to catch a homer, said on Monday he was prepared to play again.
